metadata.title: CVE-2015-0971 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The DER parser in Suricata before 2.0.8 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) via vectors related to SSL/TLS certificates.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0971` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 2.0.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.8-1').
